content: {"name": "Davidson County Community Action, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.davidsoncommunityaction.com/emergency-food-assistance/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "911 South Talbert Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Lexington", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27292", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.8139641, "longitude": -80.25961869999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(336) 249-0234", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Fill out the form on their website for assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Inquire about additional food available through TEFAP program; subject to eligibility"}]}
